availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Levi T. Dix (Bracken County river pilot)

body.p: Bracken County, Kentucky, river pilot. Kentucky native. Married Elizabeth Dix. Father of Edwin L. Dix and Harry Dix. River pilot in Bracken County in 1860.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, District No. 1, p. 69; Find A Grave, "Levi T Dix (1825 - 1893)," Memorial #116634837, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=116634837 (accessed July 20, 2017).
